revised_title: Ernest George Coker: A Pioneering Figure in Photoelasticity
tldr: Ernest George Coker was a prominent engineer and scientist who made significant contributions to the field of photoelasticity, a method for analyzing stress in materials. His work laid the foundation for the modern use of photoelasticity in various engineering applications. Coker's innovations and dedication to his research earned him numerous awards and honors throughout his career.
